extendedIngredients.name: beets
extendedIngredients.originalName: M za's marinated beets with horseradish

extendedIngredients.name: beets
extendedIngredients.original: 2. Transfer the beets to a roasting pan and cover with foil. Roast the beets until they are tender and can easily be pierced with a knife, about 1 hour. Remove from the oven and set aside to cool.

extendedIngredients.name: bread bowl
extendedIngredients.original: 1. Heat the oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, toss the beets with the thyme, olive oil, one-half teaspoon salt and one-eighth teaspoon pepper.

title: Pizzeria Mozza's Marinated Beets With Horseradish
summary: You can never have too many hor d'oeuvre recipes, so give Pizzeria Mozza's Marinated Beets With Horseradish a try. This dairy free and vegetarian recipe serves 70 and costs 13 cents per serving. One portion of this dish contains around 0g of protein, 1g of fat, and a total of 16 calories. 14 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 6 minutes. If you have apple cider vinegar, mozza's marinated beets, salt, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 16%. This score is rather bad. Try Marinated Beets with Potatoes and Horseradish, Beets With Horseradish, and Maple Horseradish Beets for similar recipes.
